attributes.action: ensure MP's expenses claims are fully investigated and fully prosecuted if or where curruption, fraud and obtaining money by deception are found to be present.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the ever increasing number of MP's being seen to have 'made a mistake' in their expenses claims all expenses should be not only audited as presently suggested but where fraud, deception and/or curruption are considered to be possible that all relevant people responsible are fully prosecuted. NO EXCEPTIONS. NO APOLOGIES. TREATMENT AS THE VOTING PUBLIC WOULD BE TREATED IN SUCH MATTERS.

rejection.details: The PM cannot instruct the police and CPS in this way.  Anyone can refer a matter to the police for investigation and they have the discretion whether to investigate the matter or not.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
